gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 114, Hawks 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets hang on and defeated the Hawks, 114-113. Mikal Bridges led the Nets with 32 points, six assists, and five rebounds, while Cameron Johnson added 17 points, six rebounds, and three assists in the victory. Trae Young tallied 30 points and nine assists for the Hawks in the losing effort. The Nets improve to 11-9 in the regular season, while the Hawks fall to 9-11.
